reviewText:
Early Access Review

This game has great potential.Graphics and sounds are of a high quality,the gameplay concept is very good but currently is very buggy.I believe this game could really turn into a fantastic title if they keep down the road of an insane astronaut stuck in a strange space..not abstracted confined rooms.
I find it hard to recommend this title in its current state even in early access. I certainly don't think it deserves the current price tag. It has 5 limited levels that are short and your main objective seems to over come the bugs within the game and not the tasks in the level.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bmxvVeiUbm4
